summary: DEFECTIVE HEAD GASKET REPLACEMENT.  MR.  THERE WAS A CRACK IN THE LOWER GASKET.  THE MECHANIC STATED THE GASKET MAY BE DEFECTIVE AND THIS PROBLEM SHOULDN'T HAVE HAPPENED THIS EARLY.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE REPAIR(S).  SCC    *JB
